PayloadContent.description: An array of PayloadContent describing individual preferences

PreferenceDomainHere.description: The preference domain that will be modified by this setting.

items.description: A dictionary that describes settings that are forced

mcx_preference_settings.description: A dict containing preferences that will be enforced

Forced.description: Forced, which corresponds to the old MCX 'Always' setting. The setting is always managed

items.description: A dictionary that describes settings that are set once

mcx_data_timestamp.description: A timestamp that is used to determine whether the setting has been applied once

mcx_preference_settings.description: A dict containing preferences that will be enforced

Set-Once.description: Set Once, which corresponds to the old MCX 'Often' or 'Once' setting. The setting is once or sometimes managed. 'Often' has been deprecated.

PayloadOrganization.description: This value describes the issuing organization of the profile, as displayed to the user

PayloadIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the payload, dot-delimited.  Usually root PayloadIdentifier+subidentifier

PayloadType.description: The type of the payload, a reverse dns string

PayloadVersion.description: The version of the whole configuration profile.
